title: Bess of Hardwick: a Tudor success story
itunes:title: Bess of Hardwick: a Tudor success story
itunes:subtitle: Kate Hubbard, biographer of Bess of Hardwick, explores the fascinating life of a Tudor woman who rose from relative obscurity to become one of the richest and most influential people of her age
description:
Kate Hubbard, biographer of Bess of Hardwick, explores the fascinating life of a Tudor woman who rose from relative obscurity to become one of the richest and most influential people of her age

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
